mapper.select: SELECT MD.nm_dept as department_name , MD.dt_start as start_date , MD.dt_end as end_date , MD.TP_DEPT as distal_yn , MD.CD_DEPT as department_code , MD.cd_bizarea AS est_id , #{yyyymm} as yyyymm , #{companyId} as company_id , #{loginUserId} AS loginUserId FROM MA_DEPT MD INNER JOIN MA_BIZAREA MB ON MD.CD_COMPANY = MB.CD_COMPANY AND MD.CD_BIZAREA = MB.CD_BIZAREA WHERE MD.cd_company = '1000' -- AND MD.tp_dept = 'Y' -- AND (MD.DT_END IS NULL OR MD.DT_END = '' OR ISNULL(MD.DT_END, '') >= ISNULL('20230712', ''))

select nm_kor as korean_name , nm_eng as english_name , NO_EMP AS employee_number , CD_DUTY_RANK as position_code , CD_DUTY_RESP as position_type , CD_DUTY_TYPE as duty_type , DT_ENTER as hire_date , DT_RETIRE as retire_date , CD_INCOM as employment_code , DT_BIRTH as birth_date , YN_USE AS USE_YN , CD_DEPT AS department_code , TP_EMP as employee_type , cd_bizarea AS est_id , #{yyyymm} as yyyymm , #{companyId} as company_id , #{loginUserId} AS loginUserId from MA_EMP where cd_company = '1000' and ( DT_RETIRE = '00000000' or SUBSTRING(DT_RETIRE,1,6) >= #{yyyymm})

SELECT HP.CD_PAYDEDUCT as itemCode , HP.NM_PAYDEDUCT as itemName , HP.YN_CHECK as useYn , #{yyyymm} as yyyymm , #{companyId} as company_id , #{loginUserId} AS loginUserId FROM HR_PCODE HP WHERE HP.CD_COMPANY = '1000' AND HP.TP_PAYDEDUCT = '001'

SELECT NO_EMP as attribute1 , DT_FROM as startDate , CD_FIX as basicCode , MCD.NM_SYSDEF as basicName , AM_FIXPAY as basicAmount , #{yyyymm} as yyyymm , #{companyId} as company_id , #{loginUserId} AS loginUserId FROM HR_PFIX HP INNER JOIN MA_CODEDTL MCD ON HP.CD_COMPANY = MCD.CD_COMPANY AND MCD.CD_FIELD = 'HR_P000003' AND MCD.CD_SYSDEF = HP.CD_FIX WHERE HP.CD_COMPANY = '1000' AND #{yyyymm} BETWEEN SUBSTRING(DT_FROM,1,6) AND SUBSTRING(DT_TO,1,6) AND AM_FIXPAY != 0

SELECT NO_EMP as attribute1 , AM_TOTPAY as bonusAmount , #{yyyymm} as yyyymm , #{companyId} as company_id , #{loginUserId} AS loginUserId FROM HR_PCALCPAY WHERE CD_COMPANY = '1000' AND YM = #{yyyymm} AND TP_PAY = '002'

SELECT DT_DATE as yyyymmdd , TP_DATE as dateType , TP_WEEK as dateWeek , NM_NOTE as description , #{yyyymm} as yyyymm , #{companyId} as company_id , #{loginUserId} AS loginUserId FROM FI_CALENDARDAY WHERE CD_COMPANY = '1000' AND LEFT(DT_DATE,4) = LEFT(#{yyyymm},4)

SELECT pay.no_emp as employeeNumber , ym as yyyymm , cd_company , SUM(PAY.AM_DEDUCT01) AS amDeduct01 -- 국민연금 , SUM(AM_DEDUCT02) AS amDeduct02 -- 건강보험 , SUM(AM_DEDUCT03) AS amDeduct03 -- 장기요양보험료 , SUM(AM_DEDUCT04) AS amDeduct04 -- 고용보험 , SUM(AM_DEDUCT05) AS amDeduct05 -- 가불금 , SUM(AM_DEDUCT06) AS amDeduct06 -- 기타공제 , SUM(AM_DEDUCT07) AS amDeduct07 -- 경조비 , SUM(AM_DEDUCT08) AS amDeduct08 -- 연말정산소득세 , SUM(AM_DEDUCT09) AS amDeduct09 -- (미정)연말정산지방소득세 , SUM(AM_DEDUCT10) AS amDeduct10 -- (미정) 건강보험정산 , SUM(AM_DEDUCT11) AS amDeduct11 -- (미정) 장기요양보험정산 , SUM(AM_DEDUCT12) AS amDeduct12 -- (미정) 연차수당 , SUM(AM_INCOMTAX) AS amIncomTax -- 소득세 , SUM(AM_RESIDTAX) AS amResidTax -- 지방소득세 , #{loginUserId} AS loginUserId FROM hr_pcalcpay pay WHERE cd_company = '1000' AND ym = #{yyyymm} GROUP BY ym, no_emp, cd_company
